json: {   "title":"Flashcard Name here",   "questions":[{"A":"Side A here", "B":"Side B here", "DescA":"Description A", "DescB":"Description B"}] }

JSON: {   "title":"Flashcard Name here",   "questions":[{"A":"Side A here", "B":"Side B here", "DescA":"Description A", "DescB":"Description B"}, {"A":"Side A of 2 here", "B":"Side B of 2 here", "DescA":"Description A2", "DescB":"Description B2"}] }

alert('There is no question key! \nPlease make sure that there is a key named "question" in the text file!')
